pages.text: Rods are a method to apply interesting benefitial effects to yourself or friends. Right-click while holding a wand to apply the effect to yourself, or attack a friend with the wand to apply the effect to them.
As a warning, the rod will impose a small amount of damage to apply it's effect.
This basic component is needed and used by each rod.
This rod removes all the effects on an entity, benefitial or otherwise.
This rod bestows Haste II for 30s.
This rod bestows Regeneration III for 30s.
This rod bestows Resistance III for 30s.
This rod bestows Strength III for 30s.
This rod bestows Night Vision for 30s.
This rod bestows Water Breathing for 30s.
This rod bestows Fire Resistance for 30s.
